game.name: Magic Kingdom
game.shortDescription: Self moving chess, RTS, Meat pigeon game. In the game, you will control the hero, lead a powerful army, release powerful magic, have a strong city defense, and coordinate resource collection to resist the enemy's strong attack
game.shortDescriptionEn: Self moving chess, RTS, Meat pigeon game. In the game, you will control the hero, lead a powerful army, release powerful magic, have a strong city defense, and coordinate resource collection to resist the enemy's strong attack
game.developers: Shanghai Lingwen Huanyu Game Co., Ltd.
game.publishers: Shanghai Lingwen Huanyu Game Co., Ltd.
